title: by section 159(2) of the Data Protection Act 2018, hereby make the following
heading: 1. These Rules, which may be cited as the Data Protection Act 2018
text_raw:
1. These Rules, which may be cited as the Data Protection Act 2018 
(Section 159(2))(Amendment) Rules 2025, shall come into operation on the 1st 
day of July 2025. 

Interpretation
text_norm: 1 rule may cited data protection act 2018 (section 159(2))(amendment) rule 2025 shall come operation 1st day july 2025 interpretation

title: by section 159(2) of the Data Protection Act 2018, hereby make the following
heading: In these Rules, the “Principal Rules” means the Data Protection Act 2018
text_raw:
2. 

In these Rules, the “Principal Rules” means the Data Protection Act 2018 

(Section 159(2)) Rules 2018 (S. I. No. 661 of 2018). 

Amendment
text_norm: 2 rule principal rule mean data protection act 2018 (section 159(2)) rule 2018 (s i no 661 2018) amendment

title: by section 159(2) of the Data Protection Act 2018, hereby make the following
heading: 3. The Principal Rules are amended by the substitution for paragraphs (f)
text_raw:
3. The Principal Rules are amended by the substitution for paragraphs (f) 

and (g) of sub-rule (5) of rule 4 of the following paragraphs: 

(f) 

(g) 

(h) 

to any person in compliance with an order or direction of a court 
requiring production or discovery of the personal data concerned; 

to a bona fide member of the Press or broadcast media in 
accordance with rules made under section 159(7) of the 2018 Act, 
and 

to any person authorised by the Sentencing Guidelines and 
Information Committee, established pursuant to section 23 of the 
Judicial Council Act 2019 to act on its behalf.”
